metadata.title: CVE-2017-16352 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 is vulnerable to a heap-based buffer overflowvulnerability found in the "Display visual image directory" feature of theDescribeImage() function of the magick/describe.c file. One possible way totrigger the vulnerability is to run the identify command on a speciallycrafted MIFF format file with the verbose flag.

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
